data: SUS Buprenorphine-Naloxone (Suboxone) Microdosing Induction
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
Consider consult with site specific addiction service or provincial addiction Rapid Access to Consultative Expertise (RACE) line prior to initiating powerplan
Alert patients' community pharmacy of hospitalization and consider discontinuation of community opioid prescription if ordering buprenorphine-naloxone in hospital
Review patient's order profile for opioids, including morphine (KADIAN), methadone maintenance and high-dose hydromorphone and consider discontinuing
Patient Care
Clinical Opiate Withdrawal Scale
Assess daily prior to first dose
Clinical Opiate Withdrawal Scale
Assess one hour after each dose
Notify Treating Provider
Notify provider if patient complains of withdrawal
Notify Treating Provider
Notify provider if HCG positive while on buprenorphine-naloxone
POC Urine Pregnancy Test
T;N, once
POC Urine Multi Drug Screen (Burnaby)
T;N, once
POC Fentanyl Urine Drug Screen
T;N, once
Medications
HYDROmorphone
mg, PO, order duration: 6 day, drug form: tab
HYDROmorphone
mg, IM, order duration: 6 day, drug form: inj
HYDROmorphone
mg, IV, order duration: 6 day, drug form: inj
HYDROmorphone
mg, subcutaneous, order duration: 6 day, drug form: inj
PRN Medications
HYDROmorphone
mg, PO, PRN other (see comment), order duration: 6 day, drug form: tab
HYDROmorphone
mg, IM, PRN other (see comment), order duration: 6 day, drug form: inj
HYDROmorphone
mg, IV, PRN other (see comment), order duration: 6 day, drug form: inj
HYDROmorphone
mg, subcutaneous, PRN other (see comment), order duration: 6 day, drug form: inj

Choose either Buprenorphine-Naloxone High Dose Titration OR Buprenorphine-Naloxone Low Dose Titration. On day 7, stop all other opioid orders and reassess for possible dose adjustment (if required, use Buprenorphine-Naloxone (Suboxone) Maintenance orders)
Buprenorphine-Naloxone High Dose Titration
buprenorphine-naloxone 2 mg-0.5 mg tab (dosed as buprenorphine)
